News.headline: Daggers Football Sundays 23rd October
News.short_description: Enjoy Super Sunday at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Why not come down to the Daggers Bar this Sunday to enjoy two live games on Sky Sports. 

Manchester City take on Southampton at home which kicks off at 1:30pm, before Jose Mourinho takes his Manchester United team back to his old home of Stamford Bridge to face Chelsea, with a kick off of 16:00pm. 

Take advantage of our Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg, with the offer starting from 1pm to 7pm. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
